<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

The core module pass which does a post-order walk of the SCCs and runs a CGSCC pass over each one.

Designed to allow composition of a CGSCCPass(Manager) and a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79ab9199d2ba6a1c9cac2b79efc194a3">ModulePassManager</a>. Note that this pass must be run with a module analysis manager as it uses the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph">LazyCallGraph</a> analysis. It will also run the <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab279be449a12f8ba5f83dceba257d796">CGSCCAnalysisManagerModuleProxy</a></code> analysis prior to running the CGSCC pass over the module to enable a <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a></code> to be used within this run safely.

Definition at line 313 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/cgsccpassmanager-h">CGSCCPassManager.h</a>.
